Subject: Help us Obi-wan Megatron, your our only hope!
To: nbwrpg@egroups.com
MIME-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
X-Mailer: AOL 5.0 for Windows sub 41
From: JP3884@...

    Paralysis, under the command of Black Aracnia, made contact with 
Megatron. He sat in the communications chamber that was adjacent to the 
bridge. Here, he would have more privacy.
    "Commander Megatron, when will you be arriving to take your seat as the 
supream Predacon Commander? Black Aracnia can only keep the peace for so long 
before the Terricons, Maximals, or whoever decide to thwart us for good!" He 
croaked.
    "What she is doing is to bring back the Predacons as they once were, in 
the beggining. We need you, just as you need us, Megatron. Contact us soon. 
Things are getting worse by the hour, and if you dont take command then 
someone who dosent like you, or your fraction, might rise up." Paralysis 
said, desperately. If the Predacons didnt get reinforcements, soon there 
wouldnt be any Predacons left.
